name: Osprey Farpoint 40 Travel Backpack
description: The Osprey Farpoint 40 is the ultimate carry-on travel backpack. Features a padded laptop sleeve, lockable zippers, and comfortable harness system.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger
description: High capacity 26800mAh portable charger with 3 USB ports. Perfect for long trips and multiple devices.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with up to 24 hours battery life. Perfect for flights and travel.

name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Cubes Set
description: Set of 3 packing cubes in different sizes. Keep your luggage organized and maximize space.

name: Travelon Anti-Theft Classic Backpack
description: Slash-resistant body and straps, locking compartments, and RFID blocking pocket. Stay safe while traveling.

name: Travel Neck Pillow Memory Foam
description: Premium memory foam neck pillow with adjustable support. Machine washable cover included.

name: Universal Travel Adapter
description: Works in 150+ countries with 4 USB ports and 1 USB-C port. Compact design for easy packing.

name: Samsonite Hardside Luggage Set
description: 3-piece hardside spinner luggage set. TSA approved locks, 360-degree wheels, and expandable design.

name: Lifestraw Personal Water Filter
description: Filters up to 1000 gallons of water. Removes 99.9% of bacteria and parasites. Essential for adventure travel.
short_description: Personal water filter for safe drinking

name: GoPro HERO11 Black
description: 5.3K video, 27MP photos, HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization. Waterproof to 33ft without housing.
